DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Greater Than Platelet Count 20000 Not Due To Infiltration Or Severe Infection Outcome Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether the platelet count greater than 20000 was not due to an infiltration or a severe infection.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Greater Than Platelet Count 20000 Negation Due To Infiltration Or Severe Infection Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._Indicates a platelet count of at least 20,000 per cubic millimeter._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Caused by or resulting from._The process of the diffusion or accumulation in a tissue or cells of a substance not normal to it or in amounts above normal. (NCI)_An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent._The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
Indicates a platelet count of at least 20,000 per cubic millimeter.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The process of the diffusion or accumulation in a tissue or cells of a substance not normal to it or in amounts above normal. (NCI)

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.
The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the platelet count greater than 20000 not due to an infiltration or a severe infection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have platelet count greater than 20,000/uL  without platelet transfusion dependence by day 43 of cycle?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient non-transfusion dependent platelet count greater than 20,000/uL not due to malignant infiltration or severe infection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If no, was the failure to recover platelet count greater than or equal to 25,000/uL due to persistent leukemia involvement or infection?

DataElement.changeDescription: Updated WF and Reg Status - bsm; Workflow and Registration Status Changed per Brenda Duggan; 05.16.18; AAML1421 - WWL
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.3.14 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002119. ak 2022.11.23 Cleaned up and released. ak
